峳字的基本解释

峳
yōu
〔峳峳〕传说中的怪兽名。形状像马，头长四只角。

峳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yóu］
［《集韻》夷周切，平尤，以。］
见“峳峳”。

峳字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　峳； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页311第36
【集韻】夷周切，音由。【山海經】䃌山有獸，狀如馬，芈目四角牛尾，名曰峳峳。見則其國多狡客。【郭璞贊】治在得賢，亡由失人。峳峳之來，乃致狡賔。【註】峳音攸，本作峳。峳字从攴作。

峳字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
峳字的起名意思

暂无。

峳
Basic explanation of words
峳
yōu
〔峳峳〕The name of the legendary monster. It is shaped like a horse with four horns on its head.
峳
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yóu］
["Ji Yun" Yi Zhou cut, Ping You, to. ]
See "峳峳".
峳
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　峳; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 311 36
[Ji Yun] Yi Zhou cuts, sound originated. [Shanhaijing] There are beasts in Dengshan, which are like horses, with four-horned oxtails, and the name is 峳峳. See it, there are many cunning people in the country. [Guo Puzan] Governance lies in gaining the virtuous, but death lies in losing others. The coming of 峳峳峳峳 is cunning. [Note] Yuyin You, this is a 峳. The word "峳" is made from 攴.
